title: Looking for team, played amateur for team Ignite last season. can also coach high diamond/challenger
body: Played amateur last season for team Ignite, scrimming tops teams like YSSC. have taken a 6 month break from playing and came back and got placed in gold. just want to try and get back into the scene and see where i get. Add me in game or msg me here pls

replies.body:
In regards to the coaching you mentioned, this post might be up your ally; http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/g1EEMZFE-challenger-team-against-all-odds-aao-lf-coachanalyst

Best of luck either way.
are you ooking to play duo ranked or team. im plat5 ranked and i can ply duo ign is kaiyunman i main{{champion:64}}
